Subject: Robots bug?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=188703988

Hi, 

just thought I'd ask about this one before digging through source code.
I've been crawling a huge multi sub- domain site *.main.domain on one 
of the sub-domains library.main.domain is the robots.txt:

User-agent *
Disallow: /

The main domain also has a robots.txt. The crawl robots policy is the default
out of the box setting. 

The crawl essentially ignored the library.main.domain/robots.txt (which in
addition to our proxy server removing all of the nice header info with 
my email address it in it caused all sorts of terrible problems but we 
wont go into that - oops).

is this a known problem or have I got set something wrong? 

cheers 

mark
